pull.title: refactor: Replace fs::unique_path with GetUniquePath(path) calls

### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* #20744 ([POC] Use std::filesystem. Remove Boost Filesystem & System by fanquake)

If you consider this pull request important, please also help to review the conflicting pull requests. Ideally, start with the one that should be merged first.

rename.from: [draft] refactor: Replace fs::unique_path with GetUniquePath(path) calls
rename.to: refactor: Replace fs::unique_path with GetUniquePath(path) calls

events.body:
Concept ACK

However, this introduces a circular dependency right now:
```
A new circular dependency in the form of "fs -> random -> logging -> fs" appears to have been introduced.
```

> However, this introduces a circular dependency right now:

I have changed the implementation. So this is fixed.

events.message: Introduce GetUniquePath(base) helper method to replace boost::filesystem::unique_path() which is not available in std::filesystem.

events.body:
Concept ACK

Thanks for paving the way for further Boost removal!
Code review ACK 1bca2aa694cd85984c09699ae28daec313077462. It's a simple change and extra test coverage is nice

comments.body: I have left this intentionally very simple. One can certainly come up with many different ways to make this more robust but I would like to solicit for feedback for this.

In commit "Introduce GetUniquePath(base) helper method to replace boost::filesystem::unique_path() which is not available in std::filesystem." (1bca2aa694cd85984c09699ae28daec313077462)

Not a problem but there is an extraneous whitespace change here
